author: Al Jazeera
title: Smokers 14 times more likely to contract coronavirus
description: According to research by Chinese doctors, acute smokers are more at risk of dying from COVID-19 than elderly people.
content:
Smokers are 14 times more likely to contract coronavirus compared with those who do not, the head of a Turkish anti-addiction group told Anadolu Agency.
Professor Mucahit Ozturk, president of anti-addiction group Turkish Green Crescent, on Thursday urged tho… [+1828 chars]
